name: Squish (MandasUC)
description:
-A Simple 2D Top Down Shooter Game.

-All Samples Are Made Of Scratch.

-The Game's Stracture is Made Of Two Basic Game Modes. 

-The First One, Made Of Three Levels. It's More Likely To Learn The Controls And  Your 4 Different Oponnents. To Win, Get Over The Setted Time And Die.

You Will Automaticlly Teleported In The Next Level.

If The Goal Time Isn't satisfied And You Lose, The Game Will Be Restarted In The Current Level You Are Playing.

-The Second One, That Is A Highscore Kind Of Level, In Which You just Have To Survive As Long As You Can!

If You Want To Check Out My Other Recently Uploaded Games,Check This Link: https://mandasuc.itch.io/
